name: Lead Address
script:
address_title=frappe.form_dict["address_title"]
address_line1=frappe.form_dict["address_line1"]
address_line2=frappe.form_dict["address_line2"]
area=frappe.form_dict["area"]
city=frappe.form_dict["city"]
state=frappe.form_dict["state"]

name=frappe.form_dict["name"]

title=address_title+"-Billing"

a = frappe.get_doc({"doctype":"Address","address_title":address_title,"address_line1":address_line1,"address_line2":address_line2,"city":city, "area":area,
"state":state})

a.insert()

parent = frappe.get_doc('Address', title)
parent.append("links", {
    'link_doctype': 'Lead',
    'link_name': name,
    # 'link_title':'Sahil Patel'
    
})
parent.save()
frappe.db.commit()

name: Email Validation For Supplier
User Number Fetch
Inquiry Form for CRM
script: request = frappe.form_dict["request"]fname = frappe.form_dict["fname"]lname = frappe.form_dict['lname']email = frappe.form_dict["email"]mobile_no = frappe.form_dict["mobile"]company = frappe.form_dict["company"]notes = frappe.form_dict["notes"]equip = frappe.form_dict['equipment']# countrycode = frappe.form_dict["code"]dt = frappe.form_dict["date"]wp = frappe.form_dict['watsappno']lead_source = frappe.form_dict['inquiry_source']leadup = ""check_opp = ""opportunity = ""list1=""customeropp = ""cust = ""op = ""customer = frappe.db.sql("select customer_name from `tabCustomer` where whatsapp_no = %s OR phone=%s ",(mobile_no,mobile_no))dk2 = frappe.db.sql("select name from `tabLead` where status != 'Converted' AND status != 'Opportunity' AND email_id = %s" ,email)dk3 = frappe.db.sql("select name from `tabLead` where email_id=%s ",email )dk = frappe.db.sql("select name from `tabLead` where status = 'Converted' AND email_id=%s ",email )for a1 in dk2:    for b1 in a1:        if leadup=="":            leadup=b1for a1 in dk3:    for b1 in a1:        if check_opp=="":            check_opp=b1            # opp = frappe.db.sql("select name from `tabOpportunity` where party_name = %s AND transaction_date=%s",(check_opp,dt))# for obj in opp:#     for p in obj:#         if opportunity == "":#             opportunity=p            for i in dk:    for j in i:        if list1=="":            list1=jfor c in customer:    for d in c:        if cust=="":            cust = d            # dk4 = frappe.db.sql("select name from `tabOpportunity` where party_name=%s AND transaction_date=%s",(cust,dt))# for a2 in dk4:#     for b2 in a2:#         if customeropp=="":#             customeropp=b2  # frappe.msgprint(customeropp) # if wp != "":if leadup != "":        # frappe.msgprint("lead update")    doc1 = frappe.get_doc('Lead', leadup)    doc1.append('equipment_inquiry', {        'equipment_name': equip,        'inquiry_date':dt    })    doc1.save()    frappe.db.commit()    # frappe.response['message'] = "success"                    frappe.msgprint("Lead is Updated")# elif customeropp!="":#     doc = frappe.get_doc('Opportunity', customeropp)#     doc.append('equipment_inquiry', {#         'equipment_name': equip,#         #  'request_type':request,#         'inquiry_date':dt#     })#     doc.save()        #     frappe.db.commit()         # frappe.response['message'] = "success"        # frappe.msgprint("Customer's Opportunity is update")    elif cust != "":    data = frappe.new_doc("Opportunity")    data.opportunity_from = "Customer"    data.party_name = cust    data.save()        doc12 = frappe.get_doc('Opportunity', data.name)    doc12.append('equipment_inquiry', {        'equipment_name': equip,        #  'request_type':request,        'inquiry_date':dt    })    doc12.save()     frappe.db.commit()         # frappe.response['message'] = "success"        frappe.msgprint("Customer's Opportunity is Created")            # elif opportunity != "":  #     # if equip == "":#     doc3 = frappe.get_doc('Opportunity', opportunity)    #     doc3.append('equipment_inquiry', {#         'equipment_name': equip,#         'inquiry_date':dt#     })#     # frappe.msgprint("test")#     doc3.save()#     frappe.db.commit()    # frappe.response['message'] = "success"                    # frappe.msgprint("Opportunity is Updated")    elif check_opp != "":     dataop = frappe.new_doc("Opportunity")     dataop.opportunity_from = "Lead"     dataop.party_name = check_opp     dataop.save()     doc3 = frappe.get_doc('Opportunity', dataop.name)     doc3.append('equipment_inquiry', {        'equipment_name': equip,        'inquiry_date':dt     })    #  frappe.msgprint("test")     doc3.save()     frappe.db.commit()     frappe.msgprint("New Opportunity is Create")             # elif op!="":#     data = frappe.new_doc("Opportunity")#     data.opportunity_from = "Lead"#     data.party_name = op#     data.save()    #     doc = frappe.get_doc('Opportunity', data.name)#     doc.append('equipment_inquiry', {#         'equipment_name': request,#         #  'request_type':request,#         'inquiry_date':dt#     })#     doc.save()        #     frappe.db.commit()     #     frappe.response['message'] = "success"    #     frappe.msgprint("Lead Opportunity is Created")else:        data2 = frappe.new_doc("Lead")    data2.request=request    data2.first_name=fname    data2.last_name = lname    data2.email_id = email    data2.mobile_no = mobile_no    data2.company_name = company    data2.supplier_notes = notes    data2.whatsapp_no = wp            data2.save()        doc2 = frappe.get_doc('Lead', data2.name)    doc2.append('equipment_inquiry', {        'equipment_name': equip,        'inquiry_date':dt        })    frappe.msgprint("New Lead is created")    doc2.save()    frappe.db.commit()            # frappe.msgprint("worked")

name: Contact Inquiry for CRM
script:
request = frappe.form_dict["request"]
fname = frappe.form_dict["fname"]
lname = frappe.form_dict['lname']
email = frappe.form_dict["email"]
mobile_no = frappe.form_dict["mobile"]
equip = frappe.form_dict['equipment']
company = frappe.form_dict["company"]
notes = frappe.form_dict["notes"]
dt = frappe.form_dict['date']
wp = frappe.form_dict['watsappno']



leadup = ""
check_opp = ""
opportunity = ""
list1=""
customeropp = ""
cust = ""
op = ""
customer = frappe.db.sql("select customer_name from `tabCustomer` where whatsapp_no = %s OR phone=%s ",(mobile_no,mobile_no))
dk2 = frappe.db.sql("select name from `tabLead` where status != 'Converted' AND status != 'Opportunity' AND email_id = %s" ,email)
dk3 = frappe.db.sql("select name from `tabLead` where email_id=%s ",email )
dk = frappe.db.sql("select name from `tabLead` where status = 'Converted' AND email_id=%s ",email )


for a1 in dk2:
    for b1 in a1:
        if leadup=="":
            leadup=b1
for a1 in dk3:
    for b1 in a1:
        if check_opp=="":
            check_opp=b1
            

# opp = frappe.db.sql("select name from `tabOpportunity` where party_name = %s AND transaction_date=%s",(check_opp,dt))
# for obj in opp:
#     for p in obj:
#         if opportunity == "":
#             opportunity=p
            
for i in dk:
    for j in i:
        if list1=="":
            list1=j

for c in customer:
    for d in c:
        if cust=="":
            cust = d
            
# dk4 = frappe.db.sql("select name from `tabOpportunity` where party_name=%s AND transaction_date=%s",(cust,dt))
# for a2 in dk4:
#     for b2 in a2:
#         if customeropp=="":
#             customeropp=b2  

# if wp != "":
if leadup != "":
    
    # frappe.msgprint("lead update")
    doc1 = frappe.get_doc('Lead', leadup)
    doc1.append('equipment_inquiry', {
        'equipment_name': request,
        'inquiry_date':dt
    })
    doc1.save()
    frappe.db.commit()
    # frappe.response['message'] = "success"        
        
    frappe.msgprint("Lead is Updated")

# elif customeropp!="":
#     doc = frappe.get_doc('Opportunity', customeropp)
#     doc.append('equipment_inquiry', {
#         'equipment_name': request,
#         #  'request_type':request,
#         'inquiry_date':dt
#     })
#     doc.save()
#     frappe.db.commit()
 
    
#     # frappe.response['message'] = "success"
    
#     frappe.msgprint("Customer's Opportunity is updated")
    
elif cust != "":
    data = frappe.new_doc("Opportunity")
    data.opportunity_from = "Customer"
    data.party_name = cust
    data.phone = mobile_no
    
    data.save()
    # frappe.msgprint(data.name)
    
    doc12 = frappe.get_doc('Opportunity', data.name)
    doc12.append('equipment_inquiry', {
        'equipment_name': request,
        #  'request_type':request,
        'inquiry_date':dt
    })
    doc12.save()
    frappe.db.commit()
    doc12.save()
    
    # frappe.response['message'] = "success"
    
    frappe.msgprint("Customer's Opportunity is Created")
    

        
# elif opportunity != "":
  
#     # if equip == "":
#     doc3 = frappe.get_doc('Opportunity', opportunity)
    
#     doc3.append('equipment_inquiry', {
#         'equipment_name': request,
#         'inquiry_date':dt
#     })
#     # frappe.msgprint("test")
#     doc3.save()
#     frappe.db.commit()
#     # frappe.response['message'] = "success"        
        
#     frappe.msgprint("Opportunity is Updated")
    
elif check_opp != "":
     dataop = frappe.new_doc("Opportunity")
     dataop.opportunity_from = "Lead"
     dataop.party_name = check_opp
     dataop.save()
     doc3 = frappe.get_doc('Opportunity', dataop.name)
     doc3.append('equipment_inquiry', {
        'equipment_name': request,
        'inquiry_date':dt
     })
    #  frappe.msgprint("test")
     doc3.save()
     frappe.db.commit()
     frappe.msgprint("New Opportunity is Created") 
    
else:
    
    data2 = frappe.new_doc("Lead")
    data2.request=request
    data2.first_name=fname
    data2.last_name = lname
    data2.email_id = email
    data2.mobile_no = mobile_no
    data2.company_name = company
    data2.supplier_notes = notes
    data2.whatsapp_no = wp
        
    data2.save()
    
    doc2 = frappe.get_doc('Lead', data2.name)
    doc2.append('equipment_inquiry', {
        'equipment_name': request,
        'inquiry_date':dt
        })
    frappe.msgprint("New Lead is created")
    doc2.save()
    frappe.db.commit()
        
    # frappe.msgprint("worked")

name: Website Item
script:
# frappe.msgprint("Hello")
name=frappe.form_dict["name"]
item_group=frappe.form_dict["item_group"]
price=frappe.form_dict["standard_rate"]
maker_model=frappe.form_dict["maker_model"]
vehicle_class=frappe.form_dict["vehicle_class"]
owner_count=frappe.form_dict["owner_count"]
model=frappe.form_dict["model"]
sub=frappe.form_dict["sub"]
fitness_dt=frappe.form_dict["fitness_dt"]
insurance_date=frappe.form_dict["insurance_date"]
manufacturing_date=frappe.form_dict["manufacturing_date"]
registration_date=frappe.form_dict["registration_date"]
equipment_condition=frappe.form_dict["equipment_condition"]
equipment_current_reading=frappe.form_dict["equipment_current_reading"]
location=frappe.form_dict["location"]
short_description=frappe.form_dict["short_description"]
description=frappe.form_dict["description"]
img1 = frappe.form_dict["img1"]
img2 = frappe.form_dict["img2"]
img3 = frappe.form_dict["img3"]


list1=[img1,img2,img3]

data = frappe.new_doc("Website Slideshow")
data.slideshow_name=name
data.save()
doc = frappe.get_doc('Website Slideshow', data.name)
for i in list1:
    doc.append('slideshow_items', {
    'image': i,
        #  'request_type':request
    })


    doc.save()
    frappe.db.commit()
asd=data.name

d=frappe.db.sql("""select supplier from `tabItem` where name=%s""",name)
list11 = ""           
for i in d:
    for j in i:
        if list11=="":
            list11=j
# frappe.msgprint(list1)
dd = frappe.db.sql("""select mobile_number from `tabSupplier` where name=%s""",list11)
list2 = []     
for ii in dd:
    for jj in ii:
        if list2==[]:
            list2=jj
            
ddd = frappe.db.sql("""select supplier_name from `tabSupplier` where name=%s""",list11)
list3 = ""     
for iii in ddd:
    for jjj in iii:
        if list3=="":
            list3=jjj     

a = frappe.get_doc({"doctype":"Website Item","web_item_name":sub,"item_code":name,"item_name":name,"description":name, "item_group":item_group, "price":price,
"maker_model":maker_model,"vehicle_class":vehicle_class,"owner_count":owner_count,"model":model,"fitness_dt":fitness_dt,"insurance_date":insurance_date,
"website_image":img1,"slideshow":asd,"manufacturing_date":manufacturing_date,"registration_date":registration_date, "equipment_current_reading":equipment_current_reading,
"equipment_condition":equipment_condition,"location":location,"short_description":short_description,"description":description,"supplier_name":list3,"supplier_number":list2})

a.insert()

frappe.msgprint(a.name)
frappe.db.commit()

label1=["Price","Equipment Id","Ownership","Manufacture Date","Brand","Current Location","Posted By","Insurance","Type","Condition","Current Reading"]
value = [price, name, owner_count,manufacturing_date,model,location,"Owner",insurance_date,vehicle_class,equipment_condition,equipment_current_reading]
label12=len(label1)
doc1 = frappe.get_doc('Website Item', a.name)
# ii=0
for jj in range(label12):
    
        frappe.msgprint(ii)
        # frappe.msgprint(jj)
        doc1.append('website_specifications', {
        "label" : label1[jj],
        "description" : value[jj]
            #  'request_type':request
        })
        # ii=ii+1
        # frappe.msgprint(ii)
doc1.save()



frappe.db.commit()
frappe.msgprint("Website Item Create")

name: Supplier details fetch
